movies.title: Ryûzô to 7 nin no kobun tachi
movies.plot: Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen (2015) is about the story of Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen who love derby race want to do the last battle with Yakuza guys.
movies.simplePlot: Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen (2015) is about the story of Ryuzo and the Seven Henchmen who love derby race want to do the last battle with Yakuza guys.

biography.bio: Tatsuya Fuji was born on August 27, 1941 in Beijing, China as Tatsuya Itou. He is an actor, known for In the Realm of the Senses (1976), Empire of Passion (1978) and Bright Future (2002). He has been married to Izumi Ashikawa since August 28, 1968. They have one child.
biography.name: Tatsuya Fuji

biography.bio: Ben Hiura was born on January 25, 1943 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Blind Swordsman: Zatoichi (2003), Dr. Akagi (1998) and La ballade de Narayama (1983).
biography.name: Ben Hiura

biography.bio: Kôjun Itô is an actor, known for Le soleil (2005), Botan to bara (2004) and Kids Return (1996).
biography.name: Kôjun Itô

biography.bio: Masanobu Katsumura is an actor, known for Sonatine, mélodie mortelle (1993), Doctor X (2012) and Keiho (1999).
biography.name: Masanobu Katsumura

biography.bio: Takeshi Kitano originally studied to become an engineer, but was thrown out of school for rebellious behavior. He learned comedy, singing and dancing from famed comedian Senzaburô Fukami. Working as a lift boy on a nightclub with such features as comic sketches and striptease dancing, Kitano saw his chance when a comedian suddenly fell ill, and he went on stage in the man's place. With a friend he formed the comic duo "The Two Beat" (his artist's name, "Beat Takeshi", comes from this period), which became very popular on Japanese television. Kitano soon embarked on an acting career, and when the director of Violent Cop (1989) (aka "Violent Cop") fell ill, he took over that function as well. Immediately after that film was finished he set out to make a second gangster movie, Boiling Point (1990). Just after finishing Getting Any? (1994), Kitano was involved in a serious motorcycle accident that almost killed him. It changed his way of life, and he became an active painter. This change can be seen in his later films, which are characterized by his giving more importance to the aesthetics of the film, such as in Fireworks (1997) and Kikujiro (1999).
biography.name: Takeshi Kitano

biography.bio: Masaomi Kondô was born on February 15, 1942 in Kyoto, Japan as Masaomi Kawaguchi. He is an actor, known for The Pornographers (1966), My Son! My Son! (1979) and La Guerre des Yokai (2005).
biography.name: Masaomi Kondô

biography.bio: Hisako Manda was born on April 13, 1958 in Osaka, Japan. She is an actress and executive, known for Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters (1985), Uzumasa Limelight (2014) and OL tachi no hanran: Izu shain satsujin jiken (1991).
biography.name: Hisako Manda

biography.bio: Akira Nakao was born on August 11, 1942 in Chiba, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Godzilla vs. Destoroyah (1995), Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla II (1993) and Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S. (2003). He has been married to Shino Ikenami since 1978. He was previously married to Narumi Kayashima.
biography.name: Akira Nakao

biography.bio: Akira Onodera was born on September 19, 1943 in Obihiro, Japan. He is an actor, known for Gamera, gardien de l'univers (1995), Amalfi: Rewards of the Goddess (2009) and Young People (1977).
biography.name: Akira Onodera

biography.bio: Fumika Shimizu is an actress, known for Kamen Rider Fourze (2011), Warau Manekineko the Movie (2017) and Ankoku joshi (2017).
biography.name: Fumika Shimizu

biography.bio: Atom Shimojô was born on November 26, 1946 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Village (1975), Older Brother, Younger Sister (1976) and Onna no kettou (1979).
biography.name: Atom Shimojô

biography.bio: Tôru Shinagawa was born on December 14, 1935 in Asahikawa, Hokkaido, Japan. He is an actor, known for Dark Water (2002), Le soleil (2005) and Flower & Snake II (2005).
biography.name: Tôru Shinagawa

biography.bio: Ken Yasuda is an actor and director, known for Spirited Away (2001), Howl's Moving Castle (2004) and Le royaume des chats (2002).
biography.name: Ken Yasuda

biography.bio: Ken Yoshizawa is an actor, known for Violent Cop (1989), Ecstasy of the Angels (1972) and Réflexions sur la mort passionnelle d'un fou (1969).
biography.name: Ken Yoshizawa
